bioconda.name: popgen-entropy
bioconda.summary: This program is for inferring population structure from autopolyploid and mixed-ploidy individuals, similar to structure, for low- to medium-coverage sequencing depth.

biocontainers.name: popgen-entropy
biocontainers.summary: This program is for inferring population structure from autopolyploid and mixed-ploidy individuals, similar to structure, but using genotype-likelihood data for low- to medium-coverage sequencing depth.
